code: var URL="https://stoctracker.herokuapp.com/stocks";export var fetchStocks=function fetchStocks(){return function(dispatch){fetch(URL).then(function(resp){return resp.json();}).then(function(resp){dispatch({type:"LOAD_STOCKS",stocks:resp});});};};export var sendStock=function sendStock(stockInfo){var stock={stock:{name:stockInfo.name+"",amount:stockInfo.amount+"",purchase_price:stockInfo.purchasePrice+"",selling_price:stockInfo.sellingPrice+""}};return function(dispatch){fetch(URL,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(stock)}).then(function(resp){return resp.json();}).then(function(data){dispatch(fetchStocks());});};};export var deleteStock=function deleteStock(id){return function(){fetch(URL+id,{method:"DELETE",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});};};
